updated_cases.title: Verify whether there is option to enable/disable the feature
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify whether there is option to enable/disable the feature
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Altos should be enabled. SSL Decryption feature should be enabled.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Configure the SSL decryption policy
2. Send the traffic through either Client or GRE mode
3. See that the required policy is hit
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Default behavior of SSL decryption should happen
2. No errors should be reported
3. No crashes should be seen

updated_cases.title: Verify that the SSL decrypt logic is specific to Client/GRE/IPSec access methods only. For other access methods the code is not triggered.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that the SSL decrypt logic is specific to Client/GRE/IPSec access methods only. For other access methods the code is not triggered.
